channel.title: Risk Terminology :: Safety Third
channel.description: A Brief Dictionary of Risk With examples as it applies to the kink community Authorâ€™s Note! Whether or not we are aware of it, risk evaluation is something that we all do every day of our lives. As kink enthusiast, it is even more important to be consciously aware of the risks involved in the activities we undertake. This writing, while not meant to be a comprehensive guide, will hopefully provide you with the vocabulary to talk about risk in a meaningful way.
